targets.expr: sum(googleads_impressions * on(ad_group_id) group_left(account_name, campaign_name, ad_group_name) googleads:ad_groups:ad_count{account_name=~"$account_name",campaign_name=~"$campaign_name",ad_group_name=~"$ad_group_name"}) - sum(googleads_impressions offset $lookback_interval * on(ad_group_id) group_left(account_name, campaign_name, ad_group_name) googleads:ad_groups:ad_count{account_name=~"$account_name",campaign_name=~"$campaign_name",ad_group_name=~"$ad_group_name"})

sum(googleads_clicks * on(ad_group_id) group_left(account_name, campaign_name, ad_group_name) googleads:ad_groups:ad_count{account_name=~"$account_name",campaign_name=~"$campaign_name",ad_group_name=~"$ad_group_name"}) - sum(googleads_clicks offset $lookback_interval * on(ad_group_id) group_left(account_name, campaign_name, ad_group_name) googleads:ad_groups:ad_count{account_name=~"$account_name",campaign_name=~"$campaign_name",ad_group_name=~"$ad_group_name"})

sum(googleads_conversions * on(ad_group_id) group_left(account_name, campaign_name, ad_group_name) googleads:ad_groups:ad_count{account_name=~"$account_name",campaign_name=~"$campaign_name",ad_group_name=~"$ad_group_name"}) - sum(googleads_conversions offset $lookback_interval * on(ad_group_id) group_left(account_name, campaign_name, ad_group_name) googleads:ad_groups:ad_count{account_name=~"$account_name",campaign_name=~"$campaign_name",ad_group_name=~"$ad_group_name"})

googleads_clicks  * on(ad_group_id) group_left(account_name, campaign_name, ad_group_name) googleads:ad_groups:ad_count{account_name=~"$account_name",campaign_name=~"$campaign_name",ad_group_name=~"$ad_group_name"} / googleads_impressions  * on(ad_group_id) group_left(account_name, campaign_name, ad_group_name) googleads:ad_groups:ad_count{account_name=~"$account_name",campaign_name=~"$campaign_name",ad_group_name=~"$ad_group_name"}

sum by (network) (googleads_cost * on(ad_group_id) group_left(account_name, campaign_name, ad_group_name) googleads:ad_groups:ad_count{account_name=~"$account_name",campaign_name=~"$campaign_name",ad_group_name=~"$ad_group_name"})

sum (googleads_cost{network="$network"} * on(ad_group_id) group_left(account_name) googleads:ad_groups:ad_count{account_name=~"$account_name"})  - sum (googleads_cost{network="$network"} offset $lookback_interval * on(ad_group_id) group_left(account_name) googleads:ad_groups:ad_count{account_name=~"$account_name"})

sum (googleads_clicks{network="$network"} * on(ad_group_id) group_left(account_name) googleads:ad_groups:ad_count{account_name=~"$account_name"})  - sum (googleads_clicks{network="SEARCH"} offset $lookback_interval * on(ad_group_id) group_left(account_name) googleads:ad_groups:ad_count{account_name=~"$account_name"})

sum without(ad_group_name, ad_group_id, instance, job) (googleads_cost * on(ad_group_id) group_left(account_name, campaign_name, ad_group_name) googleads:ad_groups:ad_count) / sum without(ad_group_name, ad_group_id, instance, job) (googleads_cost *  on(ad_group_id) group_left(account_name, campaign_name, ad_group_name) googleads:ad_groups:ad_count offset $lookback_interval) > $spike_threshold
